siteInfo.title: Genesis Gym - Create Your New Self
siteInfo.description: Genesis is not just a gym. It's a place where your new strength, endurance and confidence are born. Start your transformation today.

heroSection.subtitle: Genesis is not just a gym
heroSection.description: Genesis is not just a gym. It's a place where your new strength, endurance and confidence are born. Start your transformation today.

items.title: Latest Equipment
items.description: Train with premium equipment from leading world brands.

items.title: Flexible Schedule
items.description: We are open 24/7 for you. Train when it's convenient for you.
